name: Teleportation mushrooms
description:
Your ship has crashed, the navigation system has not enough energy to recognize where are you. You need to explore the cave and find every battery. Mushrooms are walking? No, I guess, no.

Made in under 48 hours for BYOG 2021 for the theme "Reset."

Controls

WASD - moving;

R - restart the level;

LMB - throw the absorber;

RMB - throw the light emitter;

Gameplay

Mushrooms can teleport themselves when charged. Any light charge a mushroom. The object can't be teleported to light and can't be teleported when it is lighted.
